response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product, which holds immense value to both of us. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than what we initially discussed. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $1,150,000. This offer reflects a strategic midpoint between its true value to you and my asking price, aiming for mutual satisfaction. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1150000}
